  • Supported MyRealtrip in growing 3,150% in 3 years by providing insights from data I gathered and analyzed
  • 2019 graduate MSc. Data Science

    • Hi, my name is Rose and I am a data scientist. I have work experience as a BI professional with strong business acumen and 3+ years of experience in leveraging Marketing and Product datasets to communicate KPIs/metrics and formulating actionable insights and visualizations that enable decision-making at scale.

    I have 8+ years of versatile work experience in both Multi-National Corporations and Start-Up company in diverse industries including travel, internet, hospitality, retail, HR, manufacturing, and education. I have lived and worked extensively throughout different countries in Europe, Asia, and America while achieving academic success in Data Science, International Business, Linguistics, and Music.

    I am an avid learner and enjoy being presented with challenges and that is what spins my wheels. I always endeavor to foster efficiency and quality to deliver measurable outcomes. I hope to fully utilize data science skills and business intelligence analytics experience to deliver assessable business, technology solutions, and companies growth and improvement.

    Feel free to browse the projects section to check out what I've built, send me an email or connect with me on LinkedIn.
